name: Sequential placeholders
description: Verify Tab visits $1 then $2 before exiting without an explicit $0.

name: Implicit $0
description: Ensure the auto-added $0 immediately ends the session after $1.

name: Zero-length final placeholder
description: Confirm hitting the final zero-length placeholder exits instantly.

name: Snippet ending with $0
description: Expansion should be treated as the first jump and exit right away.

name: Selection overlaps $0
description: When a selection already covers the implicit $0, Tab must exit immediately.

name: Choice placeholder
description: Cycle the choice and then leave via $0 to validate choice handling.

name: Nested snippet (if supported)
description: Check state restoration when exiting an inner snippet back to the caller.
